attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about our president, now my phone is glitching and shuts off every time I open it. I can’t believe our president would allow this... I think it’s the Chinese hackers. Lost my faith in trump😠 please take this off the apple store before anymore phones are harmed!
attributes.title: Very mad...

attributes.review: This app literally spammed my phone with Cheeto and orange emojis, I was so incredibly enraged I attempted at reporting the app for all the nonsense and the app literally punched me in the face! I had to get surgery on my face after that but the app literally ATTACKED the surgeons and impaled me with a syringe 😪 Now my face is over here looking Kim Ks booty. NO MATTER WHAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP FOR THE SAFTEY OF YOUR PET STRAWBERRY COW 🍓🐄
attributes.title: 🦌🧚🏽WOKE💕🍦 up to see this terrible app on my phone 🤡

attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc someone on tik tok told me to review it badly and bruh when i opened it, i started farting uncontrollably and shaking and when i realized what was happening, i got scared! donald trumps disgusting app causes gas problems!!!!!! anyways stay safe and clean smelling by NOT DOWNLOADING THIS APP!!! unless u do only to give it a one star. ok bye #bernie2020 and stream stuck with u🥰✨😳🥵🥳
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: I must say this is one of the absolute worst apps I’ve ever downloaded. I am disgusted that this app was ever even on my phone. I can’t believe that this app is still on the App Store at all. This is an abomination. Would give 0 stars if that was earn option, it’s what it deserves. tiktok.... time’s up
attributes.title: completely the worst ✨

attributes.review: After downloading this app, terrible things started happening. My dog fell into the Grand Canyon. While checking the app, I tripped over a rock resulting in me getting a concussion and breaking both of my legs. Another time while checking it I didn’t realize that someone had slipped rat poison into my lemonade. Do not download this app.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: When I got this app, they asked me for my credit card number and then all the numbers on the back of my social security card. When I declined, they said they were going to hire someone to kill me and said they knew my address because I let google maps run through the app. DO NOT USE THIS APP IF YOU WANT ANY MONEY IN YOUR BANK ACCOUNT!!!
attributes.title: SCAM

attributes.review:
This app was absolutely horrid. It took several hours to download and when it finally did and I opened the app it tried to give me a virus and wipe all the data off my phone. Plus there were messages in it supporting racism, homophobia, etc. If i could rate this a 0 star I would. It’s just-
 no❤️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I went on this app because I heard the president could give advice on how to treat my purple panda. Because she deserves the respect a queen deserves because she IS a queen. Instead I was harassed and told I have "hot toes" and that I was asking for it by painting them with nail polish. Excuse me? My hot toes are painted purple to represent my purple panda. I hope nobody has to be harassed for their toes the way I was 😔💔
attributes.title: Disgusting 😔

attributes.review: The app deleted immediately after I downloaded because my phone rejected it. Upon opening the app I had a seizure. This asked me a lot of unnecessary questions and when I finally got the app it called me a whole bunch of racial slurs. All of this caused me so much stress so now I go to therapy 😔.
attributes.title: Worst app in the history of apps

attributes.review: I thought this app would provide accurate information and news about Donald Trump, including his involvement with Epstein, maybe some of the classic racists and sexist comments he’s publicly made, but nooooo. Highly inaccurate and needs to be updated😌 to conclude my statement: black lives matter
attributes.title: Highly Disappointed
